urls.description: He's been ordered to clear the land by January

text: Â£10 says it wonâ€™t be cleared by January. Remember it is not a â€˜fineâ€™ it is the estimated cost of removing the waste he has already been paid to take, as legitimate businesses do every day. He is being let off very, very lightly. @EnvAgency https://t.co/JGVHaUca7A
@EnvAgency Yay team NV200

@mca_debbie @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @NewsNBC Hi Deb, we get it too and weâ€™re a mile and a half away

@gedbird @unitedutilities @EnvAgency @ConnectRightUK Hi @gedbird if you could report this to the @EnvAgency Pollution Incident line on 0800 807060 please, that would be really beneficial and could prevent long term environmental damage. Thanks

@madcow42 @unitedutilities @EnvAgency Hi, unfortunately I think you're right and there isn't financial support available. However, if you want to take a look at https://t.co/Pd22MH3Jxz they have plenty more info and guidance.

urls.title: Emerging contaminants in groundwater - British Geological Survey
urls.description: The term 'emerging contaminants' is used to describe substances which are not yet regulated, but may be of environmental or human health concern.
